info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 8:16PM CDT until June 15 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LEE...NORTHEASTERN MACON AND SOUTHEASTERN TALLAPOOSA COUNTIES... At 816 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lake Tuskegee to near Waverly, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Tuskegee, Tallassee, Notasulga, Franklin, Waverly, Martin Dam, Liberty City, Reeves Airport, Auburn University, Tallapoosa City, Tuskegee National Forest, Southern Lake Martin, Loachapoka, Yates Dam, I 85 Rest Area, Uphapee Creek, Chewacla State Park, Roxana and Reeltown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
